descriptionHTML:
Wear 5-TILES is a smartwatch text sending application that allows Android Wear users to send messages from their smartwatch thanks to its unique and intuitive keyboard specifically designed for touchscreens.

Download the User Guide here: http://bit.ly/1GZxTmz

It also allows to browse and read text messages directly on the watch without the need of using the phone.


Most important features

- Reply straight from the Wear 5-TILES message notification
- Browse easily through all your text messages
- Compose messages from your contact list or by adding a mobile number
- Type in 9 languages without changing the settings
- Intelligent dictionaries for these 9 languages
- Learning Mode

Languages
English, Spanish, French, Polish, German, Italian, Portuguese, Swedish, Norwegian.

Join the conversation through our Google+ Community https://plus.google.com/u/0/communities/105407594498438960220
comments: Contact name Contact names won't show but a great keyboard when you get used to it.
Looks and works great, but it doesn't properly show contact names at times
Does not work Bought the app, opened it but just see a blank screen. Refund please
great app, i would just like it to sync contact names instead of just phone numbers to display on each conversation thread.
I have a moto 360 2nd gen Pretty difficult to master. I couldn't get it into learning mode.
recentChanges: You can now select the languages that you use so it's easier to switch between the dictionaries.
You can access the settings on the phone app or directly on the watch - page 4 of the main thread.
